mapper.update: UPDATE invoice SET status = 'DELAY' WHERE date_format(create_time, '%Y%m%d%H') < date_format(convert_tz(now(), @@session.time_zone, '${standardOffset}'), '%Y%m%d%H') AND status is null
mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.create_time , a.invest_id , a.status , a.init_cash , a.payment_time , a.payment_price , a.returns , a.commission_rate , b.user_id , c.name , c.id as goods_id , c.cash_unit FROM invoice a JOIN invest_goods b on a.invest_id = b.id JOIN goods c on b.goods_id = c.id WHERE b.is_paper = false AND b.user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT id , name , user_id , status , customer_uid , merchant_uid , create_time , is_wait FROM membership_invoice WHERE merchant_uid = #{param1} AND is_wait = true
